file.title: Key encryption

p.text: For each your program generates its unique encryption key . All registration keys are encrypted under the encryption key , specified in this property. If you change it, then, previously issued for this facility Trial, the keys will not be approached, issued with a new encryption key , id'am users. Also, the same shall remain ID program .

remarks.text: If you use two objects Trial - for example, one to enter the activation key, the other for the generation of these keys (as in the example Examples \ Complex projects \ Trial ), then make sure that Id program and encryption key they were same !
